Calculate position effect ratios

Source: R/data-wrangling.R
calculate_position_effect.Rd

Calculates the ratio of counts between a specified timepoint and Day0 for each sequence, grouped by NAME and condition.

Usage

calculate_position_effect(dataframe, annotation, timepoint)

Arguments

dataframe

A data frame with COUNT, condition, NAME, and SEQUENCE columns.

annotation

A data frame with sequence annotations containing a Seq column.

timepoint

Character string specifying the timepoint to compare against Day0 (e.g., "Day10", "Day14").

Value

A data frame with mean counts per condition, ratio calculations, and joined annotation data.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
pos_effect <- calculate_position_effect(
  dataframe = count_data,
  annotation = annotation_df,
  timepoint = "Day10"
)
} # }
